## Linted files

- File extensions:
  - `.json`

## Configuration in MegaLinter

| Variable                  | Description                   | Default value |
|---------------------------|-------------------------------|---------------|
| JSON_FILTER_REGEX_INCLUDE | Custom regex including filter |               |
| JSON_FILTER_REGEX_EXCLUDE | Custom regex excluding filter |               |
